word_mean: 传播，传递：疾病或神经冲动的传播
遗传素质向后代的传递
病位的传移和病情的变化。

sentence.Network_en: The BBC has just successfully demonstrated a new digital radio transmission system.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国广播公司刚刚成功地演示了一套新的数字无线电传输系统。

sentence.Network_en: The transmission began with a recitation from the Koran.
sentence.Network_cn: 节目一开始是一段《古兰经》朗诵。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin transmissio) (see trans-, mission)

entry.def: The transmission of something is the passing or sending of it to a different person or place.

example.ex: Heterosexual contact is responsible for the bulk of HIV transmission.
example.tran: 艾滋病病毒大半是经异性性接触传播的。

example.ex: …the fax machine and other forms of electronic data transmission.
example.tran: 传真机及其他形式的电子数据传输

entry.def: The transmission of television or radio programmes is the broadcasting of them.
The transmission on a car or other vehicle is the system of gears and shafts by which the power from the engine reaches and turns the wheels.

example.ex: The car was fitted with automatic transmission.
example.tran: 这辆车装配了自动变速器。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of sending a message; causing a message to be transmitted
2. communication by means of transmitted signals
3. the fraction of radiant energy that passes through a substance
4. an incident in which an infectious disease is transmitted
5. the gears that transmit power from an automobile engine via the driveshaft to the live axle

auth_sentence.content: This precludes any faster than light transmission of messages.
auth_sentence.res_content: This precludes any faster than light transmission of messages.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This precludes any faster than light transmission of messages.

auth_sentence.content: Nevertheless, Cohen noted, transmission is not inefficient.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nevertheless, Cohen noted, transmission is not inefficient.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nevertheless, Cohen noted, transmission is not inefficient.

auth_sentence.content: Previous field transmission trials used a single optical band.
auth_sentence.res_content: Previous field transmission trials used a single optical band.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Previous field transmission trials used a single optical band.

stems_affixes.word_buile: miss[v.错过;想念]+ing表形容词→adj.不见的, 缺少的
re不+miss送,放出,派,错过→不送出去→怠慢的
per始终+miss送,放出,派,错过+ive……的→始终放出→纵容的
sub在下面+miss放+ive表形容词→放下面→恭顺的
mission[n.使命,任务;使团,代表团]+ary人→n.传教士

stems_affixes.value_cn: 委员会;委任,委托[书],代办;佣金,手续费
stems_affixes.word_buile: com共同+miss送,放出,派,错过+ion表名词→共同送出[选出]的人→委员会
e出+miss送,放出+ion表名词→送出去
re再+miss送,放出+ion表名词→再次放过[别人]→宽恕
o出+miss送,放出+ion表名词→放出去→省略
per始终+miss送,放出,派,错过+ion表名词→始终放出→允许
trans横+miss送,放出+ion表名词→横着送出去→播送
e出+miss送,放出+ary人→送出去的人
sub下面+miss送,放出,派,错过+ion表名词→放下面→屈服

sentences.en: We interrupt our normal transmissions to bring you a piece of special news.
sentences.cn: 我们中断正常节目, 播送一条特别新闻。

sentences.en: The company has a transmission plant in France.
sentences.cn: 那家公司在法国有一座变速器工厂。

jushi.english: The company has a transmission plant in France.
jushi.chinese: 那家公司在法国有一座生产传动装置的工厂。

jushi.english: The influenza virus has shown person-to-person transmission.
jushi.chinese: 现已证明流行性感冒病毒能在人与人之间传播。

jushi.english: We interrupt our normal transmissions to bring you a special news flash.
jushi.chinese: 我们中断正常节目,插播一条特别新闻。
